description: Leo Varadkar strongly hints that he favours safely re-opening schools in Ireland before the autumn.
title: Coronavirus: Taoiseach hints he favours re-opening schools before autumn
title_page: Coronavirus: Taoiseach hints he favours re-opening schools before autumn - BBC News
maintext: He said that everyone wanted grandparents to be able to hug their grandchildren and that "assuming everything went in the right direction, it will be one of the actions that will be possible over the course of the summer".
